{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Electronic games {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Electronic games An electronic game is a game that employs electronics to create an interactive system with which a player can play. Video games are the most common form today, and for this reason the two terms are often used interchangeably. There are other common forms of electronic game including handheld electronic games, standalone systems (e.g. pinball, slot machines, or electro-mechanical arcade games), and exclusively non-visual products (e.g. audio games). Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electronic game)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
